name: top_users_most_spent
query:
SELECT 
        user, material, description, created_at, SUM(value_obj) as total
      FROM
        {source_mip}
      GROUP BY
        user,
        material,
        description, 
        created_at

name: top_users_most_used_material
query:
SELECT 
        user, material, description, uml, created_at, SUM(qty_amount) as total
      FROM
        {source_mip}
      GROUP BY
        user,
        material,
        description,
        uml,
        created_at

name: top_users_most_used_sv
query:
SELECT 
        user, created_at, COUNT(material) as total
      FROM
        ambev_etl_source_mip_temp
      WHERE 
        material IS NULL
      GROUP BY
        user,
        created_at

name: top_materials_most_used
query:
SELECT 
        material, description, uml, created_at, COUNT(material) as total
      FROM
        {source_mip}
      WHERE 
        material IS NOT NULL
      GROUP BY
        material, description, uml, created_at

name: value_total_per_material
query:
SELECT 
        material, description, uml, created_at, SUM(value_obj) as total
      FROM
        {source_mip}
      GROUP BY
        material,
        description, 
        uml,
        created_at

name: qty_total_per_material
query:
SELECT 
        material, description, uml, created_at, SUM(qty_amount) as total
      FROM
        {source_mip}
      GROUP BY
        material,
        description,
        uml,
        created_at
